materials.raw_text:
B (Boron): 100 g 
 P (Phosphorus): 50 g 
 A (Aluminum): 25 g

sourcing.instructions:
Boron: Purchase from a chemical supply store or online retailers specializing in laboratory chemicals. 
 Phosphorus: Obtain from a chemical supply store or online as white phosphorus or phosphoric acid (ensure safety precautions). 
 Aluminum: Available at hardware stores or online as aluminum powder or filings.
